panel.title: Nginx Plus - HTTP Error Counts - Last 7 days

search.query: (sourcetype="nginx:plus:kv" OR sourcetype="nginx:plus:access") NOT status="2*" | rex field="status" "(?<http_resp_code>\d{1})" | eval http_resp_code = http_resp_code + "XX" | stats count(http_resp_code) as "Count" by http_resp_code | rename http_resp_code as "Http Error Code"
